Tampa FL November 2017 to May 2019 Successfully managed IT Dept responsible for 300 Employees throughout 8 Florida branch locations while keeping a technology uptime of 993 Coordinated and supported IT integration planning tracking and process for acquisitions and divestiture from Nortrax Equipment Managed the development of infrastructure and procedures necessary for daily support of company technology resources with minimum downtime Assisted HR in creating initial company Technology Standards and onboarding process for IT implementation IT Project Specialist Nortrax Inc Tampa FL June 2016 to November 2017 Responsible for reducing costs of IT Dept by more than 500K annually due to properly managing project lifecycles of the following HP MFP Printer removal and replacement Implementation of Cloud Fax Transition DHCP Scope restructuring and Administering of Web Jet Admin for all locations including Canada Followed given timeline for completion of projects and supported end users throughout transition Focused teams on business objectives and tracked progress to ensure project milestones were completed on time on budget and with the desired results Mitigated risk factors through careful analysis of financial and statistical data Anticipated and managed change effectively in rapidly evolving global business environments Kept track of projects and service calls using ticket tracking system and project calendars Created needed instructions and documentation for end users and help desk to support changes Performed cost saving analysis of all implemented deliverables IT Manager Boys Girls Clubs of Tampa Bay Inc Tampa FL July 2002 to May 2016 Successfully built technology foundation necessary to support two dozen computer labs that hosted 350 PCs Created and established lab minimum requirements necessary so members could properly leverage learning systems while stabilizing a safe environment for them Ensured computer equipment hardware and software are routinely updated to meet organizational needs Managed and made administrative decisions for all technology used in the organization Managed a team of 20 lab specialists and facilitated
